channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- ND Shortcodes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- ND Shortcodes

item.title: CVE-2023-1273|2024-08-02T05:40:59.688Z -- unknown -- nd%20shortcodes
item.description: The ND Shortcodes WordPress plugin before 7.0 does not validate some shortcode attributes before using them to generate paths passed to include function/s, allowing any authenticated users such as subscriber to perform LFI attacks
